newsitem.title: USA: FSA qualifies eight bond issues for insurance.
newsitem.headline: FSA qualifies eight bond issues for insurance.

text.p: Financial Security Assurance said it qualified for bond insurance following municipal eight bond issues slated for competitive sale on Monday.
--College CSD, Iowa, $4.9 million of general obligation bonds.
--Geneva Park District, Ill., $2.055 million GOs is a direct purchase.
--Lawrence Township Metro, Ind., $7.5 million GO bonds.
--St. Joseph County, Mich., $1.4 million of GO wastewater system bonds is a direct purchase.
--Oklahoma County ISD #12, Okla., $6.8 million of building bonds.
--Nottingham MUD, Texas, $2.3 million of unlimited tax bonds.
--Milton SD, Wis., $4.1 million of GO refunding bonds.
--Slinger, Wis., $1.55 million GO promisary notes. --U.S. Municipal Desk, 212-859-1650
